title: free gourmet' sticky toffee pudding
description: This gluten-free, dairy-free and refined sugar free version of sticky toffee pudding creates an amazing deep, toffee taste - wickedly good!Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need 6–8 dariole moulds, depending on the size
ingredients: 180g/6oz gluten-free flour or rice flour, plus extra for flouring the moulds
230ml/8oz soy cream, plus extra to serve
